titles.title: Guru Guru Town Hanamaru-kun
ぐるぐるタウン はなまるくん
La Pandilla de Hanamaru

anime.description: Guru Guru Town Hanamaru-kun follows the life of some children in a fictional town.

externalentity.identifier: ぐるぐるタウンはなまるくん
